none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on July 20, 2020 Description from Terminal Escape:
A four song banger from 2016 with sharpened up versions of tracks previously released on their 2015 demo. You've heard kids say that that music "slaps," right? Well, DYE "stomps." Or at least they did. SAVAGES WITH POWER
https://terminalescape.blogspot.com/2016/06/dye.html https://dyingculture.bandcamp.com/music
